MemoryInfobox.name: Goats and Ghosts
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The festival of Anthesteria, with its ghosts and new wine, honors Dionysos. A hunter tasked with both the slaughter of goats and deliveries needed help.'

General_Description: '''Goats and Ghosts''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A hunter left a message on the [[Message board|board]], calling for help.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a message board. *'''Note:'''
''Help wanted for preparations for the [[Anthesteria|feasts]] dedicated to [[Dionysos]].'' She sought out the hunter and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's happened?'' *'''Woman:''' ''It is time to honor Dionysos! Time to drink wine, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''! But there is much to prepare, and the ghosts will soon rise from the earth.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Sure they will.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I have to bring pitch to the farmer to paint his door with... it keeps the ghosts out. But game must be hunted, and goats must be slaughtered, as well.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So... you want me to kill a bunch of goats?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Yes. All of them must be gutted. Do you accept?'' (Accept - I'll kill the beasts.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''It won't be easy, but I'll take care of it.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Good. Get it done soon.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.'' Kassandra left the woman and tracked down the goats. While she dealt with the [[wild boar]] among them, the goats fled, but returned as the scuffle died down. Kassandra slew enough of the goats, and then returned to the hunter. *'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You earned your pay, mercenary. Take this.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I always finish what I've started.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped a hunter with the preparations for a festival of Dionysos, and was rewarded for this.
